summary: This is a UNP conversion of the awesome BattleMage Armour v1.1 created by Genamine and adapted to the UNP body by myself.
descriptionHtml:
** Description **
This is UNP not UNPB BBP or some HDT variant, so you wont have butt/breast physics on it. Also, the file contains the full mod (UNP female armour + male armour) so you dont need the original mod.

** Requirements**
- UNP body.

As the orignal mod's author said: "Do with it what you want, re-uploading modified versions or using it in your own uploaded mod is only allowed on Nexus, and must be credited."

You are free to realease any bug fixes for this mod as long as you give credit to the author [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21374799]Genamine[/url] for the armour and me for the first UNP conversion. 

You can visit the original mod's page here through this link:  [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69092/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D69092%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Battle Mage Armour v1.1[/url].

Credits to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/21374799]Genamine[/url] for the armour.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675]dimon99[/url] for the Dimonized UNP female body.
author: tributoo2
